Enjoy our outdoor area with BBQ facilities or head out for meals... it's your choice to relax! You have sole use of the house and garden, but note that not all bedrooms can be accessed unless you have booked for the appropriate number of guests. S
neighborhood_overview: We have so much that is special! There is a lovely park right next door or the Oval is metres away. Best of all you can walk to all of our favourite Tanunda places.
notes: We are confident that with this amazing location you will have a fantastic stay!
transit: Yes, we do have several taxi services if you want to head out further and enjoy wine tastings or dinner. There are several self-guided town walks you can do, and a diverse range of tour operators. Rent a car, limo, bus, motorbike, scooter,  hot air balloon  or helicopter!
access: You have sole use of the house and garden, but note that not all bedrooms can be accessed unless you have booked for the appropriate number of guests. Standard occupancy is 2 people accommodated in one Queen bedroom.
interaction: We allow guest to enjoy our property in privacy but are not far away to answer questions or to provide help. We're local so we know Tanunda intimately and want to enjoy our town as much as we do.
house_rules: Please note that base occupancy is for 2 adults in one Queen room.  If 2 people require 2 separate rooms a $50 surcharge will apply per booking. If 3 people require 3 separate rooms a $100 surcharge will apply per booking.
host_about: We feel very lucky to live and work in the Barossa and hope you will enjoy exploring our region during your stay! We like the rural feel where we live, with vineyards just over our back fence, but we are minutes to the centre of the township. We enjoy our wine and food and the opportunity to relax, so we understand that our guests might just like to be left to do their own thing and enjoy some time out. We like to take short impromptu getaways. Hubby loves his footy and horse-racing hence Foxtel in the cottage for people who may not want to miss a game while away. I enjoy gardening as being surrounded by a natural setting is important to me. If you want recommendations of where to dine out and what to do, we are happy to point you in directions that we have experienced and recommend! Careers in hospitality brought us to the Barossa in 1997... we're still here!

name: Riverdell Bunkhouse
summary: Perfect for groups, large families and travellers. With bunk style accommodation, there is plenty of room at an affordable cost.  If you are looking for comfortable accommodation for up to eleven people, then Riverdell Bunkhouse is for you!
space: Perfect for groups, large families and travellers. With bunk style accommodation, there is plenty of room at an affordable cost.  If you are looking for comfortable accommodation for up to eleven people, then Riverdell Bunkhouse is for you! Modest in its fittings, our bunk style accommodation provides a place to sleep while you relax in our beautiful environment and take advantage of our natural surrounds. The bunkhouse is a self-contained home which sleeps 11 people in total, with two bathrooms (one recently refurbished). There is ample parking space, a fully equipped kitchen, lounge room and dining area. All linen is supplied, and we have filtered rainwater on tap, overhead fans and evaporative air-conditioning.  Included in your accommodation fee is access to explore to the stunning Riverdell Property, less than a 10-minute drive to Gawler. Riverdell is situated on a beautiful 10-acre property surrounded by nature. Access to an in-ground 15x8m swimming pool is also included. While y

notes: With additional accommodation options on the property, contact us if you're looking to host larger groups.

host_about:
Riverdell Spiritual Centre is:
A workshop and retreat centre in a unique natural setting
Home to a community of people committed to self-discovery and personal development
Hosting spiritual leaders and educational programs intended to empower the individual
A Yoga and Meditation studio that offers a range of wholistic experiences
Located on the Adelaide Plains beside the Gawler River and close to the Barossa Valley, only 45 min from the Adelaide CBD
Connecting with people locally and around the globe.
At Riverdell Spiritual Centre, we pride ourselves on the atmosphere we provide. Whether here for a workshop, event or retreat, guests experience the love and care this place has been building for over 35 years.
Since 1979, people have been stewarding this property with a spiritual intention and a focus of radiating love into their world.
As one of the oldest continuing intentional spiritual communities in Australia, there has been much positive thought directed toward this land and everything on it. This has soaked in over years and manifested into a feeling that is sensed immediately upon arrival.
The atmosphere at Riverdell Spiritual Centre is refreshing and nourishing for the higher work of awakening, growth and personal development.
We welcome you to share this space where we hope you’ll feel at home.

host_about:
I am a single mum. 3 children 8,6 and 2. My husband is gone and so I try to give my kids the best life I can. I worked for BHP for 9 years as travel consultant. After that we bought s hotel in Egypt. after our 2nd daughter was diagnosed with cerebral palsy, we made the decision to return to Australia to get the help needed. I have travelled to many places and hope to continue.
I now study midwifery and love it.

name: Just 4 Ewe
summary: Just 4 Ewe is a brand new 2 storey house.  I run a small gift & homeware store downstairs and the entire upstairs is all yours and Just 4 Ewe to relax and rewind after your days exploring what Gawler & The Barossa have to offer you. Across from us is a playground & park if you are travelling with children. Only 500m is a 24/7 service station and the Willaston Pub which serve lunch & dinners 7 days a week. Main street of Gawler is only a 15-20min walk away. The Barossa is only a 20-30min drive.
space: You will have the entire upstairs of the house to yourself.  It can sleep up to 6 people PLUS 1 travel cot for a baby/toddler. Upstairs is fully contained with 2 bedrooms, lounge room, dining room, bathroom, toilet, kitchen. Fully ducted heating/cooling Parking onsite on road. Use of backyard.
